name: Diva Girls: Diva Ballerina
overview: The closest thing to real ballet! Using your Wii Balance Board and Wii Remote, learn and perform real ballet moves that will amaze your friends. Hone your balance, rhythm, speed and flexibility until you're ready to perform on the biggest stage. Are you ready to be a star? - Wii Balance Board compatible - Practice real ballet moves and perform them for the crowd - Track your progress and measure how close you are to your dream performance - Train your upper body with the Wii Remote and lower body with the Wii Balance Board - put it all together for the performance!
